**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 243 2.0 You are skilled at a form of performance, using your talents to impress a crowd or make a living. Basic Competence Some performances require you to be more than just charismatic, and if you don't meet the demands of the art form or the audience, the GM might apply a penalty based on the relevant attribute. For example, if you're dancing and have a negative Dexterity modifier, you might take a penalty to your attempt at dancing. Likewise, if you are orating and have a negative Intelligence modifier, you might have to hope your raw Charisma can overcome the penalties from your intellectual shortcomings—or ask someone to help write your speeches! Performance Traits When you use an action that utilizes the Performance skill, it gains one or more traits relevant to the type of performance. The GM might change these depending on the circumstances, but the most common performance-based traits are listed below. If you want to be particularly skilled with one type of performance, you can select the [Virtuosic Performer](/Feats.aspx?ID=862) skill feat (page 264). That feat breaks down some of the performance listed above into specific instrument types, and your GM might allow you to add your own type. ##
**Performance****Additional Traits**
Act or perform comedy [Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), and [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)
Dance [Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) and [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)
Play an instrument [Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) and [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)
Orate or sing [Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) and [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101)
 Performance Trained General Actions - [Earn Income](/Skills.aspx?ID=21&General=true) by staging a performance. Item Bonuses for Performance
Item Bonus Level Category Consumable Note

[Spectacles of Discernment](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3631) +1 13 [Held Items](/equipment/held-items) No item bonus to all Performance checks, but this increases to a +2 item bonus for Performance checks to sing.
[Talented Tap Shoes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3535) +2 11 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Performance checks using dance
[Skirmisher's Coat](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3696) +2 11 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No item bonus to all Performance checks
[Gasping Lament](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3741) +2 12 [Coda](/equipment/staves/coda) No Performance checks
[Sacred Valkyrie Helm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3648) +2 19 [Apex Items](/equipment/apex-items) No item bonus to Performance checks
[Potion of Passing Fancy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3637) +3 4 [Potions](/equipment/consumables/potions) No When used to play a violin, this ivory bow functions normally but grants a +3 item bonus to any Performance check attempted as a result.
[What Doors We Open](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3705) +3 14 [Grimoires](/equipment/grimoires) No item bonus to all Performance checks
